name: Marionette Dancer
description:
Marionette Dancer is the story of Mirabel, an human orphan that found herself in a world inhabited by anthropomorphic bugs made of precious gemstones and found a magical mask worn in the past by their rulers that granted her incredible powers, becoming the monarch of them all.

10 years later, the day of the anniversary, a monster and a mysterious girl wearing a demon mask cause the destruction of her world and leave her stranded somewhere else. Now Maribel, alongside the help of a boy that can speak with animals, will try to find the responsibles of that and make them pay.

Right now, all there is is just the first part of the first chapter, in which you'll meet Maribel, the Monarch of the Gem Bugs, and her struggle to get herself ready for the celebration of the anniversary of her crowning... and get a little taste of what is next.

I'll update it as soon as possible.
